indexWebEntity

public java.lang.String indexWebEntity(WebEntity webEntity)
                                throws IndexException
Adds or updates a WebEntity to the index. If ID is not empty, the existing WebEntity with that ID is retrieved and this LRU is added to it; if no existing WebEntity with that ID is found, or if ID is empty, a new WebEntity is created. TODO distinguish adding to LRUs or replacing LRUS in updates

Parameters:
webEntity - the webentity to index
Returns:
id of indexed webentity
Throws:
IndexException - hmm

indexWebEntityCreationRule

public void indexWebEntityCreationRule(WebEntityCreationRule webEntityCreationRule)
                                throws IndexException
Adds or updates a single WebEntityCreationRule to the index. If the rule's LRU is empty, it is set as the default rule. If there exists already a rule with this rule's LRU, it is updated.

Parameters:
webEntityCreationRule -
Throws:
IndexException - hmm

batchIndex

public int batchIndex(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects)
               throws IndexException
Indexes a batch of objects. To increase performance, the input batch is divided over a number of asynchronous index-writing tasks that use a RAMDirectory each. When all are done, each of the RAM indexes is merged to the persistent FSDirectory index.

Parameters:
objects -
Returns:
number of indexed objects
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
IndexException

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<WebEntity>> findMatchingWebEntityLRUPrefixes(java.lang.String lru)
                                                                                          throws IndexException
Returns a map of matching LRUPrefixes and their WebEntity. If the same LRUPrefix occurs in more than one WebEntity, they are all mapped.
